study_plan_entry.title: Science and technology of UV-induced polymerization

free_text.Learning outcomes: Learn about the basics of UV-induced polymerization, key methods, applications and scientific and technological advances in the field[br/]
free_text.Content: 1. Introduction to radiation processing [br/]2. Fundamentals of free-radical systems[br/]3. Components of photocurable formulations: photoinitiators, monomers, additives[br/]4. Analytical methods: state of the art and new developments[br/]5. Structure-property relations in UV curable polymers[br/]6. Advances in UV-induced polymerization research[br/]7. Application to UV inks and coatings, nanostructures and devices[br/][br/]
free_text.Note: Program relevant for students in materials science, chemistry and micro-engineering[br/]	(part of the course on 'selected topics in polymer science')[br/]
